title: CNN-News18 Runs Old Video As ‘Chinese Engineer Beating Pak Driver’
subtitle: Viral Video Fact Check: On Monday, 29 June, CNN News18 misreported an old video from Malaysia with a false claim that it from a recent incident where a Chinese engineer can be seen beating a Pakistani driver in Karachi.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On Monday, 29 June, CNN News18 aired an old video from Malaysia with a false claim that it is from a recent incident where a Chinese engineer was caught on camera beating a Pakistani driver in Karachi.

However, The Quint found that this video is as old as 2016 and contrary to the claim, was shot in Malaysia.
